//izlude,56,132,5	shop	[C]Vellum	#99,18113:10,2016:10,1586:10,1395:10,1832:10,21001:10,18114:10,13072:10,1587:10,16021:10,1492:10,1396:10,1293:10,21002:10,1294:10,1436:10,16020:10,1981:10,1927:10


izlude,47,129,5	script	Market	723,{
	mes "[^0000ffWarp Agent^000000]";
	mes "Where do you want to go?";

	switch(select("City Center","Exit")) {
		case 1:
			warp "izlude",128,111;
			close;
			break;
		case 2:
			close;
			break;
	}
}

	mes "Where do you want to go?";

	switch(select("Market","Exit")) {
		case 1:
			warp "izlude",57,130;
			close;
			break;
		case 2:
			close;
			break;
	}
}

crystilia,62,78,5	script	Warp Agent#3	723,{
	mes "[^0000ffWarp Agent^000000]";
	mes "Where do you want to go?";

	switch(select("Izlude","Exit")) {
		case 1:
			warp "izlude",128,111;
			close;
			break;
		case 2:
			close;
			break;
	}
}
